name: 黃慧禎
objective:
國文，是運用本國語言文字表達思惟想法，欣賞文學作品，充實文化內涵，增進人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。授課內容以語言和文學為範圍。希望藉此擴展學生深入品味文字趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，增強寫作文章的功底，甚而嘗試創作。
"Chinese Language" is a course that uses the native language to express thoughts, appreciate literary works, enrich cultural connotations, and enhance humanistic quality.
The course is divided into 2 credits for the first semester and 2 credits for the next semester. The content is based on the language and literatures . It is hoped that  will expand the students' ability to deeply appreciate the taste of words, exercise flexible language sensitivity,enhance the foundation of writing articles , and even try to create.
